doc:
Alida Rouffe https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alida_Rouffe 0 Alida Rouffe (1874–1949) was a French actress. Joséphine Marie Rouffe was born on March 20, 1874 in Bordeaux. Her father was mime artist Louis Rouffe (1849-1885). She spent most of her career on stage in the south of France, and like her father, she performed in the Alcazar. Later, she acted in many films, including those directed by Marcel Pagnol.She died on November 21, 1949 in Marseille. Alida_Rouffe ( 1874 – 1949 ) was a_French_actress . Joséphine_Marie_Rouffe was_born on March_20_,_1874 in Bordeaux . Her_father was mime_artist_Louis_Rouffe_(_1849-1885_) . She spent most of her_career on stage in the_south of France , and like her_father , she performed in the_Alcazar . Later , she acted in many_films , including those directed by Marcel_Pagnol.She died on November_21_,_1949 in Marseille .
